LABEL: 0x103
STRING: Now that I'm outside, I arrive at a path covered in stardust.

LABEL: 0x15C
STRING: A star-shaped stone guides me, shining brightly.

LABEL: 0x20B
STRING: Two girls stand on the road covered in stardust.

LABEL: 0x286
STRING: "Hey, are you sure you want to go?"

LABEL: 0x2FB
STRING: "Wouldn't it be better to turn back?"

LABEL: 0x394
STRING: I've already decided on what I will do.

LABEL: 0x3D5
STRING: This line of thinking is how I escaped the prison.

LABEL: 0x4C7
STRING: "Thank you... for helping me. It made me happy."

LABEL: 0x554
STRING: "Take care, and have a nice rest of your day."

LABEL: 0x71D
STRING: "Are you sure about this? I won't hold you back. You don't want him to go, do you?"

LABEL: 0x7BA
STRING: "Yeah... but I think this is a good thing!"

LABEL: 0x837
STRING: "I hope he finds what he's looking for..."

LABEL: 0x8C8
STRING: "Me too. I pray for his safety."

LABEL: 0x970
STRING: I pass through the road covered in stardust and enter a tunnel.

LABEL: 0x9D1
STRING: I can only hear the echo of my running footsteps.

LABEL: 0xA72
STRING: Two girls stand in the tunnel.

LABEL: 0xAEB
STRING: "Hi. Are you ready to accept the truth?"

LABEL: 0xB64
STRING: "Are you sure you want to go? Is it really okay?"

LABEL: 0xCB1
STRING: "Okay. If that's what you want, I won't stop you."

LABEL: 0xD36
STRING: "Let's meet again somewhere! We can have a million congratulatory toasts together!"

LABEL: 0xDCF
STRING: "Have a nice day. And please, stay healthy."

LABEL: 0xFB8
STRING: "Do you think he can save her?"

LABEL: 0x109C
STRING: "Alright. If you say so, then it must be fine."

LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: After passing through the tunnel, I reach a mountain.

LABEL: 0x11A7
STRING: I climb a steep mountain, undeterred by the long road.

LABEL: 0x11FE
STRING: Two girls stand atop the mountain.

LABEL: 0x12BF
STRING: "Um... do you really want to go?"

LABEL: 0x133C
STRING: "Is this really okay? You won't be able to come back here."

LABEL: 0x13DF
STRING: If I leave here, I will never be able to return.

LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: And knowing that, I'm here now.

LABEL: 0x14BB
STRING: "Is that so? It's your choice - I won't stop you."

LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: "So good bye. I hope you remember us."

LABEL: 0x15D9
STRING: "...Ah, right. It may surprise you, but I didn't hate you."

LABEL: 0x175F
STRING: "I wonder what will happen to us."

LABEL: 0x17DA
STRING: "Maybe we'll be gone when, as they say, the train leaves the station."

LABEL: 0x18B8
STRING: "Moeko, are you having a hard time dealing with it? Are you afraid of disappearing?"

LABEL: 0x193F
STRING: "No, well... I'd be lying if I said I'm not scared."

LABEL: 0x19D2
STRING: "It might sound strange but... I'm glad he's being sent off."

LABEL: 0x1A63
STRING: "Yeah. We're going to the same place if we're right."

LABEL: 0x1C09
STRING: After descending the mountain, I enter a field filled with red flowers.

LABEL: 0x1C5E
STRING: Countless flower petals dance in the wind; it's filled with a special fragrance.

LABEL: 0x1CC3
STRING: Two women stand in the field of red flowers.

LABEL: 0x1DF9
STRING: "Haha, I wonder if you can even do that."

LABEL: 0x1E65
STRING: The question isn't whether I can do it or not.

LABEL: 0x1F58
STRING: "You're certainly in a good mood. You might be ready now."

LABEL: 0x1FE3
STRING: "Well, do you best. Your teacher is rooting for you."

LABEL: 0x206A
STRING: "I wish you luck. I hope your hard work will be rewarded at the end of the story."

LABEL: 0x21F8
STRING: "Yeah. He went to save her... someone he loves."

LABEL: 0x227D
STRING: "I feel relieved. It feels like a weight has been lifted off my shoulders."

LABEL: 0x230C
STRING: "Really? I thought you wanted to stop him."

LABEL: 0x23A3
STRING: "Not really. But when I thought about his sorry fate, I can't help but think of it as someone else's problem."

LABEL: 0x244E
STRING: "It's the same for you, isn't it? Teachers know these things."

LABEL: 0x24DB
STRING: "So you understand? Hehe... I like to watch people worry."

LABEL: 0x2570
STRING: "How troublesome. Would you like to get along from now on?"

LABEL: 0x269D
STRING: After passing through the red flower garden, I enter a white flower garden.

LABEL: 0x26F8
STRING: White flowers are blooming like the red flowers just now. It's a fantastic sight.

LABEL: 0x2769
STRING: Two girls stand in the field of white flowers.

LABEL: 0x289B
STRING: "Kyaha. You're going to see her, huh?"

LABEL: 0x28F7
STRING: There's no time to mourn our separation.

LABEL: 0x2944
STRING: I... feel I have to meet her.

LABEL: 0x29A1
STRING: That's why I've come this far.

LABEL: 0x2A0C
STRING: "Yeah. You're determined... I can't stop you now."

LABEL: 0x2A91
STRING: "Goodbye. We were together a short time... though I think it was a rich and decent time."

LABEL: 0x2B2A
STRING: "Big brother, do your best! Mihomi is rooting for you."

LABEL: 0x2CA0
STRING: "I don't think he'll ever come back."

LABEL: 0x2D19
STRING: "Oh, he's definitely going to help that girl. Mihomi knows!"

LABEL: 0x2E33
STRING: "Why? That's not true! I should have done it."

LABEL: 0x2EC0
STRING: "Things that don't matter to him... are important to me."

LABEL: 0x2F57
STRING: "It was an irreplaceable time... I won't forget it."

LABEL: 0x2FDA
STRING: "I can't forget him. I'm sure he took care of you, too, Psico."

LABEL: 0x30A8
STRING: After passing through the white flower garden, I arrive in Children's Limbo.

LABEL: 0x3103
STRING: A bumpy gravel road. Here and there, there are piles of stones that look like they were piled up by someone.

LABEL: 0x317C
STRING: A girl stands by the riverside, holding a cat.

LABEL: 0x3243
STRING: "I've been waiting for you. I thought you would come soon."

LABEL: 0x32B5
STRING: Thank you. The time I spent with you was a mundane happiness.

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: Although you knew it was a fiction, you stayed by my side.

LABEL: 0x33A3
STRING: "I wish I could have stayed with you forever..."

LABEL: 0x3513
STRING: "I ended up putting my feelings on the back burner."

LABEL: 0x359C
STRING: "Speaking selfishly, I wanted to spend eternity with him. Even if this is a world of lies."

LABEL: 0x363F
STRING: "But it's fine. I hope he finds the path he's looking for."

LABEL: 0x378E
STRING: After passing through the riverbed, I keep running.

LABEL: 0x38BD
STRING: I see her in a small boat by the river.

LABEL: 0x3ACA
STRING: She's about to get on the ship and leave.

LABEL: 0x3B23
STRING: To the other side of the River Styx...

LABEL: 0x3B6C
STRING: Don't die, Nana. Please don't go...

LABEL: 0x3C67
STRING: "It's not... It's not like that, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x3D45
STRING: With her black hair blowing in the wind, she mutters this sadly.

LABEL: 0x3DA4
STRING: Nana, where are you going? ...What happened?

LABEL: 0x3E27
STRING: "It's not your time yet, is it?"

LABEL: 0x3F0E
STRING: I panic and check the surface of the water.

LABEL: 0x3F59
STRING: My reflection on the water's surface...

LABEL: 0x417A
STRING: "Haven't you noticed? I'm not the one who must cross this river..."

LABEL: 0x431F
STRING: "The person who must cross and reach the other side... is you."

LABEL: 0x44FA
STRING: "Don't be surprised. Did you know? About my role..."

LABEL: 0x469D
STRING: "My name is Charon. The ferrywoman of this ship."

LABEL: 0x482C
STRING: "I bring those who lost their lives to the other side."

LABEL: 0x4914
STRING: I give her a wreath composed of six flowers.

LABEL: 0x49F4
STRING: Charon, holding the wreath, looks at it lovingly.

LABEL: 0x4A7D
STRING: "It is as you think. At the end of a long journey, you got... the price for crossing the river. Six love letters."

LABEL: 0x4C4B
STRING: She takes the oars, and begins to row.

LABEL: 0x4C96
STRING: The oars splash against the water.

LABEL: 0x4D11
STRING: "It must have taken a long time to get here. You must have seen a lot on this journey."

LABEL: 0x4DA4
STRING: "What sort of world did you expect to see at the end of your life?"

LABEL: 0x4E35
STRING: "Was it fun? Were you happy? ...Was it a story about being saved?"

LABEL: 0x4F06
STRING: My journey was... a strange one.

LABEL: 0x4F55
STRING: On one occasion, I visited a big and beautiful house, collecting scattered diaries.

LABEL: 0x4FCC
STRING: On another occasion, I had amnesia; I was tricked by three girls.

LABEL: 0x5031
STRING: I was also in a fairy tale, wearing a red hood, while walking to my grandmother's house.

LABEL: 0x50C0
STRING: "...Yes. The happy future you want to see... I won't be there."

LABEL: 0x513E
STRING: One time, I saved a girl sitting next to me using a time loop.

LABEL: 0x51A5
STRING: One day in summer, I returned to a rural town and had a love triangle with two childhood friends.

LABEL: 0x521A
STRING: Another time, I noticed that my best friend was of the opposite sex, and I couldn't help but feel lustful.

LABEL: 0x52A7
STRING: "I'm sure all of those memories were precious for you."

LABEL: 0x5338
STRING: Maybe not for you as you are now. They probably feel like alter egos from your perspective.

LABEL: 0x53CA
STRING: In another world, a girl kept me captive; however, she was also in captivity.

LABEL: 0x542F
STRING: On a day where I learned about my life expectancy, an alien granted my wish.

LABEL: 0x5492
STRING: One day, when I was a child, I was ruthlessly bullied by a foul-mouthed kindergartener.

LABEL: 0x5590
STRING: "Many trials await you on the other shore."

LABEL: 0x55F8
STRING: In a certain reality, the flower garden where five girls waited, the ugly flowers of this world bloomed.

LABEL: 0x5661
STRING: In a small white garden, I fought against demons to protect my precious family.

LABEL: 0x56E8
STRING: "But... it's okay. Now that you've made it this far..."

LABEL: 0x5748
STRING: Let's go see the end of this fake world.

LABEL: 0x5797
STRING: Charon and I are now past the water...
